title: eNNi eNNi nidam
sahitya:
eNNi eNNi nidam kaNNIr viDum enmEl irakkamillaiyO paranE cidambaranE


anupallavi

  uNNavillai ayyA urakkamum varavillai uLLam tuDituDikka kaLLA nin kAdalai


caraNam    UrAr paghaikkavum uTrAr naghaikkavum OmkAra vINaiyum tAngAdu meliyavum
pOrADum manaduDan kArODum iravilE vArArO durai enrE vazhi pArttun anbaiyE
